languages.text: "Когда беда ступает на порог, каждый делец думает лишь о своем добре. А губернатор — именно что делец, пускай и рядящийся в одежды слуги Империума".
"When disaster comes knocking, a businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Когда беда ступает на порог, каждый делец думает лишь о своем добре. А губернатор — именно что делец, пускай и рядящийся в одежды слуги Империума".

traits.locale_text: "When disaster comes knocking, а businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When disaster comes knocking, а businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "When disaster comes knocking, a businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “灾难降临时，商人唯一关心的只有他们自己的财产。尽管总督穿着帝国仆人的服装，但他毕竟是位商人。”
languages.original_text: "When disaster comes knocking, a businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “灾难降临时，商人唯一关心的只有他们自己的财产。尽管总督穿着帝国仆人的服装，但他毕竟是位商人。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « En cas de désastre, les hommes d'affaires ont tendance à se soucier uniquement de leurs propriétés. Et même s'il se prétend serviteur de l'Imperium, le gouverneur est avant tout un homme d'affaires. »
languages.original_text: "When disaster comes knocking, a businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « En cas de désastre, les hommes d'affaires ont tendance à se soucier uniquement de leurs propriétés. Et même s'il se prétend serviteur de l'Imperium, le gouverneur est avant tout un homme d'affaires. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando el desastre llega, un hombre de negocios se preocupa solo por su propiedad. Y el gobernador es un hombre de negocios consumado, aunque vista las ropas de un sirviente del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "When disaster comes knocking, a businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando el desastre llega, un hombre de negocios se preocupa solo por su propiedad. Y el gobernador es un hombre de negocios consumado, aunque vista las ropas de un sirviente del Imperium».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「災害時に商売人が関心を持つのは、自分の財産のことだけだよ。なんだかんだいって総督は商売人だ、服装が帝国の従者でもね」
languages.original_text: "When disaster comes knocking, a businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「災害時に商売人が関心を持つのは、自分の財産のことだけだよ。なんだかんだいって総督は商売人だ、服装が帝国の従者でもね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn eine Katastrophe beginnt, denkt ein Geschäftsmann nur an seinen eigenen Besitz. Der Gouverneur ist schließlich Geschäftsmann, wenn er auch das Gewand eines Dieners des Imperiums trägt."
languages.original_text: "When disaster comes knocking, a businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn eine Katastrophe beginnt, denkt ein Geschäftsmann nur an seinen eigenen Besitz. Der Gouverneur ist schließlich Geschäftsmann, wenn er auch das Gewand eines Dieners des Imperiums trägt."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "When disaster comes knocking, a businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."

languages.text: "İş adamları, felaket kapıya dayandığında bir tek kendi mallarını mülklerini düşünür. Her ne kadar İmparatorluk hizmetkârı kisvesine bürünmüş olsa da vali de iş adamı."
languages.original_text: "When disaster comes knocking, a businessman's only concern is for his own property. The governor is a businessman, after all, albeit one dressed in the garb of a servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "İş adamları, felaket kapıya dayandığında bir tek kendi mallarını mülklerini düşünür. Her ne kadar İmparatorluk hizmetkârı kisvesine bürünmüş olsa da vali de iş adamı."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
